title: EXPRESS DELIVERY
text1: With each order from 250,000 VND, Yay - For Kids applies the promotion code Free Shipping Nationwide for Standard Delivery service.
text2: Delivery time is about 1-2 days for orders within Ho Chi Minh City; and 3-4 days for applications outside the province.
text3: If customers have urgent delivery needs, please pay the costs incurred for express delivery service.
